title: Normal Team Names
body:
Hey,
It would be cool, if the (normal) teams can be given names, by submitting one and the rest of the team votes in the end!
The name with the most votes will be the team name.
It would bring more positive treatment within the team, by working one name out together.
Of course there needed to be a chat filter for it, but overall, it would be fun :D
-EisKrieger

replies.body: Seems like more trouble to implement than it is worth.
